5.2 #LayoutsAndViews.NavbarVertical Vertical navbar

Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup 

.MY_NAVBAR_VERTICAL_WRAPPER { height: 400px; }

.MY_NAVBAR_VERTICAL {
  .navbar("vertical"; li; a; ~".current"; false; false);

  .MY_BRAND {
    .sugar-logo(20px; 150px);
    vertical-align: middle;
  }
}

.MY_NAVBAR_VERTICAL_WITH_ICONS {
  .navbar("vertical"; ~"span.menu"; a; ~".active"; ~".SUBMENU_OPEN"; ~"div.SUBMENU");
  .MY_BRAND {
    .sugar-logo(20px; 150px);
    vertical-align: middle;
  }

  .ICON_GITHUB {
    .getFaIcon('github'; 'fab');
    .fa-fw;
  }

  .ICON_CAR {
    .getFaIcon('car-side');
    .fa-fw;
  }

  .ICON_CANNABIS {
    .getFaIcon('cannabis');
    .fa-fw;
  }

  .CARET_DOWN {
    .getFaIcon('caret-down');
  }

  .SUBMENU {
    .navbar-submenu-menu("inline"; span);

    .DIVIDER {
      .navbar-submenu-menu-divider();
    }
  }
}

.MY_NAVBAR_VERTICAL_WITH_CLASS_NAMES {
  .navbar("vertical"; ~".navigation-item"; ~".navigation-item-link"; ~".active"; false; false);

  .MY_BRAND {
    .sugar-logo(20px; 150px; true);
    vertical-align: middle;
  }
}

.MY_USER_AVATAR {
  .avatar();
  float: left;
  margin-right: .5em;

  &:after { margin-top: 10px; }
}
Example
  • Menu 1
  • Selected Menu 2
  • Very long text appears on menu item number 3
  • James

Markup: documented-components/hbs/navbar-vertical.hbs 
<section class="MY_NAVBAR_VERTICAL_WRAPPER display-flex">
    <ul class="MY_NAVBAR_VERTICAL">
        <li>
            <a><span class="MY_BRAND"></span></a>
        </li>
        <li>
            <a>Menu 1</a>
            </li>
        <li class="current">
            <a>Selected Menu 2</a>
        </li>
        <li>
            <a>Very long text appears on menu item number 3</a>
        </li>
        <li></li><!-- intentionally empty element is a self-growing spacer in navbar -->
        <li>
            <a><span class="MY_USER_AVATAR"></span> James</a>
        </li>
    </ul>

    <div class="MY_NAVBAR_VERTICAL_WITH_ICONS">
        <span class="menu menu-item-10">
            <a><span class="MY_BRAND"></span></a> <a onclick="toggleClass(`menu-item-10`, `SUBMENU_OPEN`)"><i class="CARET_DOWN"></i></a>
        </span>
        <div class="SUBMENU">
            <span><a>Group 1 Submenu 1</a></span>
            <span><a>Group 1 Submenu 2</a></span>
            <span class="DIVIDER"></span>
            <span><a>Group 2 Submenu 3</a></span>
            <span><a>Group 2 Submenu 4</a></span>
            <span class="DIVIDER"></span>
            <span><a>Veeeeeeeeeeery looooooongg meeeenuuuu itemmmmmmmmmmmm</a></span>
        </div>
        <span class="menu menu-item-11">
            <a><i class="ICON_GITHUB"></i> Menu 1</a> <a onclick="toggleClass(`menu-item-11`, `SUBMENU_OPEN`)"><i class="CARET_DOWN"></i></a>
        </span>
        <div class="SUBMENU">
            <span><a>Group 1 Submenu 1</a></span>
            <span><a>Group 1 Submenu 2</a></span>
            <span class="DIVIDER"></span>
            <span><a>Group 2 Submenu 3</a></span>
            <span><a>Group 2 Submenu 4</a></span>
            <span class="DIVIDER"></span>
            <span><a>Veeeeeeeeeeery looooooongg meeeenuuuu itemmmmmmmmmmmm</a></span>
        </div>
        <span class="menu menu-item-12 active">
            <a><i class="ICON_CAR"></i> Selected Menu 2</a> <a onclick="toggleClass(`menu-item-12`, `SUBMENU_OPEN`)"><i class="CARET_DOWN"></i></a>
        </span>
        <div class="SUBMENU">
            <span><a>Group 1 Submenu 1</a></span>
            <span><a>Group 1 Submenu 2</a></span>
            <span class="DIVIDER"></span>
            <span><a>Group 2 Submenu 3</a></span>
            <span><a>Group 2 Submenu 4</a></span>
            <span class="DIVIDER"></span>
            <span><a>Veeeeeeeeeeery looooooongg meeeenuuuu itemmmmmmmmmmmm</a></span>
        </div>
        <span class="menu menu-item-13">
            <a><i class="ICON_CANNABIS"></i> Very long text appears on menu item number 3</a> <a onclick="toggleClass(`menu-item-13`, `SUBMENU_OPEN`)"><i class="CARET_DOWN"></i></a>
        </span>
        <div class="SUBMENU">
            <span><a>Group 1 Submenu 1</a></span>
            <span><a>Group 1 Submenu 2</a></span>
            <span class="DIVIDER"></span>
            <span><a>Group 2 Submenu 3</a></span>
            <span><a>Group 2 Submenu 4</a></span>
            <span class="DIVIDER"></span>
            <span><a>Veeeeeeeeeeery looooooongg meeeenuuuu itemmmmmmmmmmmm</a></span>
        </div>
        <span class="menu menu-item-14"></span><!-- intentionally empty element is a self-growing spacer in navbar -->
        <span class="menu menu-item-15">
            <a><span class="MY_USER_AVATAR"></span> James</a> <a onclick="toggleClass(`menu-item-15`, `SUBMENU_OPEN`)"><i class="CARET_DOWN"></i></a>
        </span>
        <div class="SUBMENU">
            <span><a>Group 1 Submenu 1</a></span>
            <span><a>Group 1 Submenu 2</a></span>
            <span class="DIVIDER"></span>
            <span><a>Group 2 Submenu 3</a></span>
            <span><a>Group 2 Submenu 4</a></span>
            <span class="DIVIDER"></span>
            <span><a>Veeeeeeeeeeery looooooongg meeeenuuuu itemmmmmmmmmmmm</a></span>
        </div>
    </div>

    <nav class="MY_NAVBAR_VERTICAL_WITH_CLASS_NAMES">
        <span class="navigation-item">
            <span class="navigation-item-link" href="#"><span class="MY_BRAND"></span></span>
        </span>
        <span class="navigation-item">
            <span class="navigation-item-link" href="#">Menu 1</span>
        </span>
        <span class="navigation-item active">
            <span class="navigation-item-link" href="#">Selected Menu 2</span>
        </span>
        <span class="navigation-item"></span><!-- intentionally empty element is a self-growing spacer in navbar -->
        <span class="navigation-item">
            <span class="navigation-item-link" href="#"><span class="MY_USER_AVATAR"></span> James</span>
        </span>
    </nav>
</section>
